member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.TemperatureSensors
member.summary: List of all temperature sensors in the instrument

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.TemperatureSensors.ControlBoardTemperature
member.summary: Temperature of the Control Board

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.TemperatureSensors.MagnetTemperature
member.summary: Temperature of the NMR Magnet

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.TemperatureSensors.EnclosureTemperature
member.summary: Temperature of the enclosure. This is the closest temperature to ambient.

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.LineWidth
member.summary: The width (in Hz) of an NMR line at a specific percentage of spectral line height Example: 1.2Hz at .50 (50 %)

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.LineWidth.Threshold
member.summary: Percentage of line height

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.LineWidth.Width
member.summary: Width in Hz

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.LineShape
member.summary: Characterizes the line shape of the shim reference and therefore the resolution of the instrument.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.LineShape.LineWidths
member.summary: A list of linewidths that describe the line shape

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.LineShape.Shim_Timestamp
member.summary: When the shim was run to produce these line widths

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.SimpleSpectralPoint
member.summary: A single point within a spectrum Plotting these points will give a 'quick and dirty' spectrum

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus
member.summary: Summary of spectrometer characteristics and performance

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.TimeStamp
member.summary: When the status was generated

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.SerialNumber
member.summary: The spectrometer's serial number

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.SpectrometerFrequency
member.summary: Magnet operating frequency in Hz

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.Sensors
member.summary: Readings from all the temperature sensors

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.Resolution
member.summary: The line shape resulting from the latest auto-shim

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.Drift
member.summary: How quickly the signal is drifting despite the frequency locking mechanism Measured in Hz per second

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.SoftwareVersion
member.summary: Software version installed

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.FirmwareVersion
member.summary: Firmware version installed

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerStatus.StandbyModeOn
member.summary: Standby mode setting. When standby mode is on, instrument keeps itself shimmed and ready

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings
member.summary: Base class for Experiment Settings

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_1D
member.summary: 1D Experiment Settings

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_1D.PulseAngle
member.summary: Read only, in degrees

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_1D.PulseWidth
member.summary: In microseconds

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General
member.summary: General parameters that control NMR experiments

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.Experiment
member.summary: Which specific NMR experiment to run

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.Solvent
member.summary: The solvent used with the sample

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.NumberOfScans
member.summary: The number of scans to run

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.SpectralWidthInPpm
member.summary: The range of frequencies over which NMR signals are to be detected. It is the reciprocal of the sampling interval.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.NumberOfPoints
member.summary: The number of data points acquired by the spectrometer (a binary multiple of 1024)

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.ScanDelayInSeconds
member.summary: A delay to allow for sample NMR relaxation between scans

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.PulseWidthInMicroseconds
member.summary: The length of the 90 degree pulse in microseconds

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.IntegrationMethod
member.summary: Method used to define peak integral

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.ActiveTimeScanInSeconds
member.summary: The time during which the spectrometer is busy acquiring and processing data. This depends on the Spectral Width, Number of points, and zero filling factor.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.TimePerScanInSeconds
member.summary: The amount of time to complete a single scan, including acquisition time, delay time, and processing overhead time. One scan is the single acquisition of an NMR spectrum.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.TotalDurationInSeconds
member.summary: The estimated time the entire experiment will take to run (all scans)

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.DigitalResolutionInHz
member.summary: The number of Hz per digital point. The digital resolution is the sweep width (in Hz) divided by the total number of digital points, the sum of number of acquisition and zero filling points. Finer digital resolution enables greater definition of fine features.

member.name: M:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentSettings_General.Copy(NMReady.WebTypes.Web_ExperimentSettings_General)
member.summary: Copy fields from JSON object into this object

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.PeakParameters
member.summary: Parameters that control how peaks are identified

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegionReport
member.summary: Description of an individual processed integration area

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegionReport.Region
member.summary: The corresponding integration region

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegionReport.Integration
member.summary: The integration value of the peak. Compare to Reference Energy for ratio.

member.name: M:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegionReport.ToString
member.summary: Converts object to readable string

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegionsReport
member.summary: Reports results relative to pre-defined integration regions

member.summary: List of processed integration areas

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegionsReport.ReferenceEnergy
member.summary: Used to calculate region ratios

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults
member.summary: The final results of the NMR experiment. There are no intermediate reports generated at this time.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.OriginalReceipt
member.summary: The receipt generated when the experiment was launched

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.TimeStamp
member.summary: When the results were generated

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.ResultCode
member.summary: The current status of the experiment

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.NumberOfScansRun
member.summary: The number of scans run

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.IntegralsReport
member.summary: List of resulting integral regions

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.JDX_FileContents_FD
member.summary: Raw experimental results in JDX format, frequency domain

member.summary: List of points to display a simple FD spectrum

member.summary: List of points to display a simple TD spectrum

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.MagnetFrequency
member.summary: Magnet Frequency in Hz

member.summary: Raw experimental results in JDX format, time domain

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.JDX_Filename
member.summary: Base filename of the generated JDX file(s) residing on the instrument

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.Peaks
member.summary: A list of detected peaks in the spectrum

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.PeakThreshold
member.summary: The threshold used to detect the peaks. This value is calculated based on a multiplier and the detected noise level.

member.name: M:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentResults.SaveResultsToFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Write out results to a JDX file and a TD file

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentReceipt
member.summary: A receipt returned after launching an experiment.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentReceipt.TimeStamp
member.summary: When the receipt was generated

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentReceipt.ResultCode
member.summary: The current status/result of the experiment

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ExperimentReceipt.Settings_General
member.summary: A copy of the settings used to run the experiment

member.summary: A message from the spectrometer regarding its operation. Includes warnings, recommendations, etc.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.OperationalMessage.TimeStamp
member.summary: When the message was generated

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.OperationalMessage.ResultCode
member.summary: Reference/type code for the message

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.OperationalMessage.Value_double
member.summary: A value associated with the message (e.g. temperature)

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.OperationalMessage.ReadableMessage
member.summary: Human readable message

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.OperationalMessageList
member.summary: List of operational messages generated by the spectrometer

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.OperationalMessageList.List
member.summary: The list of messages

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.SolventGroup
member.summary: List of solvents supported by the instrument

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegion
member.summary: A single integral region (contains no results, just defines the region)

member.summary: Start of the integration area in PPM

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegion.RegionEndInPpm
member.summary: End of the integration area in PPM

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegions
member.summary: The list of integration areas to be monitored

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegions.List
member.summary: The list of integrals

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationRegions.ReferenceEnergy
member.summary: Reference Energy used for calculating integral region ratios. The value is used with the reference peak.

member.summary: The specific details for an auto-shimming request

member.summary: Specifies the shimming mode or target (e.g. reference tube)

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimSettings.Method
member.summary: The shimming method (e.g. quick 5 minute shim routine)

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingStatus
member.summary: Current status of an auto-shimming routine

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingStatus.OriginalCommand
member.summary: The command used to launch the shimming routine

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingStatus.PercentComplete
member.summary: Percentage completion

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingStatus.Message
member.summary: Human-readable status (English-only)

member.name: P:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingStatus.ShimmingResult
member.summary: Resulting line shape (i.e. resolution)

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerTestStatus
member.summary: Status of a test running on the spectrometer (abstract)

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.SolventCalibrationStatus
member.summary: Status of a solvent calibration

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.StartupTestStatus
member.summary: Status of a startup test running on the spectrometer

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.Experiments
member.summary: The list of experiments supported by the spectrometer

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.Experiments.GENERAL
member.summary: General or unknown experiment

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.Experiments.CUSTOM_SCRIPT
member.summary: Invoke a custom LUA script

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.StandbyModeSettings
member.summary: States for standby mode

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.Languages
member.summary: The list of supported languages

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ResultCodes
member.summary: Categorizes the response from the spectrometer

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationMethods
member.summary: Predefined methods for determining peak integral

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationMethods.MANUAL
member.summary: Set manually on the touchscreen interface or defined via the API. Recommended to use this setting

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.IntegrationMethods.AUTOMATIC
member.summary: Integrals on but automatic detection used

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.SpectrometerCommands
member.summary: List of commands that can be sent to spectrometer

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingMethods
member.summary: The specific shimming script that will be run on the spectrometer Each method has a unique strategy and duration

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingMethods.COMPLETE_CANCEL
member.summary: When reading, auto-shim has completed. When writing, auto-shim will be cancelled

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingMethods.QUICK
member.summary: Typical duration is 5 minutes

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingMethods.MEDIUM
member.summary: Typical duration is 10-12 minutes

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingMethods.FULL
member.summary: Typical duration is 30 minutes

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingMethods.CUSTOM_1
member.summary: This auto-shim defined on spectrometer on Setup > Autoshim tab Click the Quick Select button

member.name: T:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingTarget
member.summary: What is being used to shim on

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingTarget.REFERENCE
member.summary: A.k.a. maintenance shimming. Uses coloured reference tubes shipped with spectrometer These are proprietary tubes that must be manually inserted by the user before a shimming routine is started

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingTarget.SOLVENT
member.summary: Shimming is performed on whatever sample is in the system as long as the solvent type is specified. Solvent shimming is particular to each sample and can be used in a dynamic operation such as in a flow system.

member.name: F:NMReady.BaseTypes.ShimmingTarget.EXTERNAL_LOCK
member.summary: External lock will be supported in the near future

member.summary: Launch a solvent calibration

member.summary: Check the status of a solvent calibration

The specific shimming routine to run
